00079     void clearQueue();

00081     unsigned int getPushEventFailures() { return(pushEventFailures_);}
00082     unsigned int getEvents() { return(events_);}

00087     void setRegistryWarning(std::vector<char> const& message);
00088     std::vector<char> getRegistryWarning() { return registryWarningMessage_; }

00090 
00091     long long getEventCount(STATS_TIME_FRAME timeFrame = SHORT_TERM,
00092                             STATS_SAMPLE_TYPE sampleType = QUEUED_EVENTS,
00093                             double currentTime = BaseCounter::getCurrentTime());

00095                         STATS_SAMPLE_TYPE sampleType = QUEUED_EVENTS,
00096                         double currentTime = BaseCounter::getCurrentTime());
